scripts.prisma:gen: pnpm run prisma:merge && npx prisma generate --schema=prisma/schema.merged.prisma
scripts.prisma:migrate: pnpm run prisma:merge && npx prisma migrate dev --schema=prisma/schema.merged.prisma
scripts.prisma:all: pnpm run prisma:merge && npx prisma generate --schema=prisma/schema.merged.prisma && npx prisma migrate dev --schema=prisma/schema.merged.prisma && del prisma\schema.merged.prisma
